Level 6 Conjuration Spell

You and everyone around can't be poisoned, diseased, or frightened. Your HP increases, and you make Wisdom Saves with Advantage.

Heroes' Feast is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Heroes' Feast is a Lvl 6 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Heroes' Feast Information in BG3

Description: You and everyone around can't be poisoned, diseased, or frightened. Your HP increases (by 12), and you make Wisdom Saves with Advantage. Level: Lvl 6 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: None

Baldur's Gate 3 Heroes' Feast Tips & Notes

Creates a temporary Feast Supplies container for 10 turns which contains about 50 Camp Supplies and a Water flask. They drop to the ground when the container disappears. The 12 HP from Heroes' Feast stacks with the bonus HP granted by Aid.
